amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete language that exempts certain tax and tariff provisions from a private sector mandate point of order.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to delete the provisions in the bill that exempt from points of order measures resulting in net decreases in tax revenues over five years.

action.text: Moakley amendment (A002) modified by unanimous consent.
On agreeing to the Moakley amendment (A002) as modified Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 233 (Roll No. 156).
